text: Penthides is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Penthides. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Penthides anilis Holzschuh, 2010 * Penthides flavus Matsushita, 1933 * Penthides modestus Tippmann, 1955 * Penthides rufoflavus (Hayashi, 1957) ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Penthides
